#summary The introduction to perlwikipedia


= Example code =

{{{
use Perlwikipedia; #Note that the 'p' is capitalized, due to Perl style

my $editor=Perlwikipedia->new(); #Create a Perlwikipedia object

$editor->login('perlwikipediabot','supersecretpassword'); #Logs into the English Wikipedia

$editor->set_wiki('de.wikipedia.org','w'); #Set the current wiki to de.wikipedia.org,
which                     
                                           uses 'w' as its path
                                           (de.wikipedia.org/w/index.php)
my $text=$editor->get_text('Main Page'); #Pull the wikitext of the Main Page
}}}

This is just a brief example of what perlwikipedia is capable of!
